run.label: hotspot3d_prep
run.description:
## Preprocessing

7 required, 1 optional, 8 total

         drugport  --  0) Parse drugport database (OPTIONAL)
         uppro     --  1) Update proximity files
         calroi    --  2) Generate region of interest (ROI) information
         statis    --  3) Calculate p_values for pairs of mutations
         anno      --  4) Add region of interest (ROI) annotation
         trans     --  5) Add transcript annotation
         cosmic    --  6) Add COSMIC annotation to proximity file
         prior     --  7) Prioritization

##Analysis

4 required, 2 optional, 6 total
       

         search    --  0) 3D mutation proximity searching
         post      --  1) Post-processing of 3D proximity searching output
         cluster   --  2) Determine mutation-mutation and mutation-drug clusters
         sigclus   --  3) Determine significance of clusters (BETA/OPTIONAL)
         summary   --  4) Summarize clusters (OPTIONAL)
         visual    --  5) Visualization of 3D proximity (OPTIONAL)

run.label: calroi
run.description:
##help

Usage: hotspot3d calroi [options]

REQUIRED  
--output-dir                 Output directory of proximity files

--help                       this message

## usage

example command

hotspot3d calroi --output-dir=./

fileDef.fileContent:
#!/bin/bash

mkdir proximityFiles
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles

#!/bin/bash

mkdir proximityFiles
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles

run.label: statis
run.description:
/opt/hotspot3d/bin/hotspot3d statis --output-dir=./
Q15796
Creating .//proximityFiles/pvalues/Q15796.ProximityFile.csv

##help

Usage: hotspot3d statis [options]

REQUIRED

--output-dir                 Output directory of proximity files

--help                       this message

## usage

example command

/opt/hotspot3d/bin/hotspot3d statis --output-dir=./
Q15796
Creating .//proximityFiles/pvalues/Q15796.ProximityFile.csv

fileContent.script:
'#!/bin/bash \n\
\n\
mkdir proximityFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles \n\
\n\
cp '+$job.inputs.proximity_file.path+' proximityFiles'

run.label: anno
run.description:
##help

Usage: hotspot3d anno [options]

        --output-dir                 Output directory of proximity files

        --help                       this message
## usage

## example command

fileContent.script:
'#!/bin/bash \n\
\n\
mkdir proximityFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/annotationFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pvalues \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.proximity_file.path+' proximityFiles \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.proximity_file.path+' proximityFiles/pvalues \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.ProximityFile_annotationFiles.path+' proximityFiles/annotationFiles'

run.label: trans
run.description:
##help

     Usage: hotspot3d trans [options]

     REQUIRED
     --output-dir                 Output directory of proximity files

     OPTIONAL
     --blat                       Installation of blat to use (defaults to your system default)

     --help                       this message

fileContent.script:
'#!/bin/bash \n\
\n\
mkdir proximityFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/annotationFiles \n\
mkdir humanPeptides \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.ensembl_peptide_database.path+' humanPeptides'

run.label: cosmic
run.description:
##help

     Usage: hotspot3d cosmic [options]

     REQUIRED
     --output-dir                 Output directory of proximity files

     OPTIONAL

     --help                       this message

fileContent.script:
'#!/bin/bash \n\
\n\
mkdir proximityFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/annotationFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/annotations \n\
mkdir cosmic \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.proximity_file.path+' proximityFiles/annotations \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.cosmic_database.path+' cosmic \n\
bzip2 -d cosmic/'+$job.inputs.cosmic_database.path.split("/").reverse()[0]

inputs.label: prioritization app linear distance cutoff
inputs.description: --linear-cutoff Linear distance cutoff (> peptides), default is 0

run.label: prior
run.description:
##help

     Usage: hotspot3d prior [options]

     REQUIRED
     --output-dir                 Output directory

     OPTIONAL
     --p-value-cutoff             p_value cutoff(<=), default is 0.05
     --3d-distance-cutoff         3D distance cutoff (<= Angstroms), default is 20
     --linear-cutoff              Linear distance cutoff (> peptides), default is 0

     --help                       this message

## Output example

     root@910a8355235c:/temp02# /opt/hotspot3d/bin/hotspot3d prior --output-dir=./
     Q15796
     -------.//proximityFiles/cosmicanno/Q15796.ProximityFile.csv---
     Creating .//prioritization/Q15796.ProximityFile.csv

fileContent.script:
'#!/bin/bash \n\
\n\
mkdir proximityFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/cosmicanno \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.cosmic_annotated_proximity_file.path+' proximityFiles/cosmicanno'
